column2: ITP 016 - AGL Removal of Luminaires and Install of foundations
column8: ITP 016 - AGL Removal of Luminaires and Install of foundations

column2: Frequency: Prior to commencing any activity
• Ensure that all employees and subcontractors are using the latest and complete set of drawings
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
Frequency: Prior to commencing any activities
• All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is PSP, EMP, TMP, SWMS & WP.
Record of conformity: Site and Office Inspection
• All materials shall be proven to meet contractual requirements prior to acceptance.
Record of conformity: Datasheet / Material Submission
Frequency: Prior to commencing any activity
• Surveyor to pick up existing location of all AGL Luminaires and position of foundations are prescribed based on design RL.
Record of conformity: Survey as Built
2.0 Removal of AGL Luminaires and installation of Foundation
• Ensure that the light to be removed corresponds to project drawings and documentation.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed & Sub-contractor ITP
• Prior to commencement of removal, the subcontractor shall ensure that the light has been isolated from power.
Reference Documents: APAM Electrical Isolation Standards
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed & Sub-contractor ITP
• Remove light as per Subcontractor checklist for the different methods.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed & Sub-contractor ITP
• After removal of the light, the subcontractor must ensure that the light number and position is recorded and stored accordingly for re-installation.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed & Sub-contractor ITP
• Core pavement to required depth as per subcontractor ITC for relevant Method.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed & Sub-contractor ITP
• Position bung/spacer in 150mm diameter hole of foundation. Ensure cables and conduits are clear and clean.
• Surveyor to provide final design surface level.
• Mix and position quick set concrete onto the top of the existing foundation and let cure.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed & Sub-contractor ITP
• As required, luminaire fittings to be safeguarded to allow for placement of asphalt with a Blanking plate.
Record of conformity: This Signed ITP & Sub-contractor ITP
• Place hotmix asphalt in void above new foundation and compact using hand tools.
• Ensure asphalt is finished flush with surrounding surface.
Record of conformity: This ITP Signed & Sub-contractor ITP
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
